name: Secret Maryo Chronicles
description: Secret Maryo Chronicles is a clearance game and the “Super Mario” in Linux. During the game, you need to collect gold coins and finally reach the end, that's passing the level. smc is a very classic game that requires players to use the brain to finish all clearance tasks with simple game play.

en_US.description: Secret Maryo Chronicles is a clearance game and the “Super Mario” in Linux. During the game, you need to collect gold coins and finally reach the end, that's passing the level. smc is a very classic game that requires players to use the brain to finish all clearance tasks with simple game play.
en_US.name: Secret Maryo Chronicles

zh_CN.description: Secret Maryo Chronicles是一款通关游戏，是Linux下的超级玛丽奥。在游戏过程中，您需要收集金币，并且最终到达终点，即可过关。Secret Maryo Chronicles玩法简单，但是需要玩家开动大脑来完成所有的通关任务，是一个非常经典的游戏。
zh_CN.name: Secret Maryo Chronicles
